alert.note: Alert for Book Cliffs; Colorado River Basin; Southeast Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 17 at 9:27PM MDT until June 19 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 487, 490, AND 491... * AFFECTED AREA...In Utah, Fire Weather Zone 487 Book Cliffs, Fire Weather Zone 490 Colorado River Basin and Fire Weather Zone 491 Southeast Utah. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...10 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Conditions may be favorable for easy ignition and rapid spread of fires due to low relative humidity and strong gusty winds. * THUNDERSTORMS...Will form Sunday morning and continue into the afternoon hours. * OUTFLOW WINDS...Gusty and variable winds of 40 to 50 mph are possible from any convection that forms.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Book Cliffs; Colorado River Basin; Southeast Utah
